description.value:
Increase the distance you @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Shove]{Shove} your opponent with @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Aggressive Block]{Aggressive Block} or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Brutish Shove]{Brutish Shove} to 10 feet on a success or 20 feet on a critical success.

When you use Aggressive Block, you can choose whether the target is @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} or Shoved. When you make a Brutish Shove, you also Shove the target 5 feet on a failure.
